𒊑 Ruf cry 𒊑 •Reiher 𓅣 ⋍ 𓅥 Heron Kranich <> 𒉆𒅗𒊏 cry 𒄷 𒊑 𒈽 𒈹 𒈺 MUŠ 𒈬 𓅓 musen 𒄷 𒉅 𒉆 𓅨 𓂋 part of bird series

𒊑 RI #rehû #ramû : 𒊑 RI রাখা rakha räkeln ruhen #laqātu 𐌻𐌰𐌲𐌾𐌰𐌽 legen lägga likt luta "lay" 𒊑 RI ronçar lançar lance "lean, place, cast" 𒊑 RI release, lead away, let go
